Microapp

Microapp Reference

Platform Version 2017.5.0

  • Updated JavaDocs.

Platform Version 3.0.0

  • Consumer Proguard rules added.

Platform Version 2.2.0

  • ActivityLauncher constructor updated.
  • initializer for BaseFlowManager updated.

Platform Version 1.1.0

  • Base State.
  • Base Condition.
  • Flow Manager Stack.
  • Base Flow Manager.

Platform Version 1.0.0

  • UappSettings.
  • UappInterface, UappDependencies and UappLaunchInput.
  • PRX dependencies.
  • ActionBarListener and BackEventListener.
  • FragmentLauncher, ActivityLauncher and UiLauncher.

Description

UApp-framework is a component which provides framework to all common components to integrate each common component in uniform way and provides support of flow manager to support dynamic flow of micro-app.

Installation

  • Maven repository based method is used to integrate “Microapp” library with any Android app.
      At compile time, machine has to be connected with Philips network
  • Maven repository (Artifactory based) Integration: The easiest and preferred way to use these components is using maven. All dependent libraries should be downloaded from artifactory.
  • Refer integration document - Document
  • Build Config Current Version:
      compileSdkVersion 26
      buildToolsVersion ’26.0.2’
      minSdkVersion 21
      targetSdkVersion 26

Refer integration document - Document
